title: Prioritize Snowplow Routes
description: After a heavy snowfall, an operator must prioritize snowplow routes, starting with major roads and bus routes.

tasks.description: Identify all 'Priority 1' routes from the city's snow removal plan (major arterials, hospital routes).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the list of critical roads.

tasks.description: Check the real-time location of all available snowplows.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the current location of the entire plow fleet.

tasks.description: Assign the nearest plows to begin clearing the Priority 1 routes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent dispatches the plows with their assigned routes.
